authors.author: St. Paul Students' Choir (University of Nairobi)

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Alfajiri ya kupendeza,
ni siku njema siku
yenye baraka.
Jua limekwishachomoza,
laamsha wote waliolala.
Ndege nao wanalialia
kumshukuru Muumba.

verse.name: c2
verse.lines:
Njooni,
(Njooni baba mama na watoto
njooni wote mbele za Bwana
tumtolee shukrani zetu,
kwa kutoa sadaka). x2

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Ndege wanamshukuru,
kwa sauti za kupendeza.
Na sisi tumshukuru,
kwa zawadi alizotupa
(njooni).

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Wanyama pia na mimea,
vyote vimeumbwa na Mungu.
Vitu vyote vya duniani,
vyapaswa kumshukuru Mungu
(njooni).

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Aliumba dunia hii,
kaweka giza pia mwanga.
Mchana tufanyeni kazi,
usiku na tupumzike.
(njooni)
